1.content:
There are many fictional worlds out there. Anime, cartoons, video games, books. All full of sexy ladies ready to be hypnotized, controlled, and messed with.

What would happen if a member of this world learned hypnosis? Or discovered a mind control power? How would they use them? For mischief? For conquest? For sex?

Or perhaps someone ends up at a hypnosis show and gets controlled for the entertainment of an audience?

Or even more still, if they find a hypnosis video online and fall under it's sway?

There are so many possibilities to explore. So many girls to watch get hypnotized and toyed with.
1.title: The beginning

111.content:
The world of Naruto!

Who is the one getting hypnotized though?
111.title: Naruto

1111.content: Tsunade it is! But HOW does she get hypnotized?
1111.title: Tsunade

choices: Shizune asks her to do something simple
Tsunade overhears a man tell his wife to do something, and Tsunade has to do it
11111.content:
Tsunade was fed up with this.

She knew that a festival was being planned in Konoha, but it bothered her that most of her subordinates were off preparing for it instead of doing their jobs. So, for today at least, if she wanted something done she'd have to do it herself.

The busty blonde Hokage made her way through the forest around the village until she found the small cave entrance, seemingly carved in the ground.

A trader sent from Gaara stumbled across this odd cave. Neither he nor Tsunade were familiar with it, so Tsunade decided to investigate.

She made her was down in through the entryway, a torch in hand.

She looked down at her feet, feeling something there.

She kicked, sending a few spiders cascading off of her.

"Gross..." She snarled as she kept going.

After a time, the cave turned from dirt to stone, and opened up to a large room.

The room was, for the most part, empty. With one exception.

In the back of the room stood some sort of altar. On it, a statue. Or rather, three statues.

The statue in the middle was a man standing, arms crossed, a smile on his face. To his left and right, though, were two naked women, bowing down to him.

Tsunade looked it over and sneered.

"Disgusting"

She looked down. At the base of the statue was a sort of tray, and on it, an ancient looking necklace. A golden choker.

Tsunade bent down and picked it up, looking it over.

"Decent taste in jewelry though." She shrugged. She looked down again, seeing text carved into the tray. But it was in an ancient language. One Tsunade certainly couldn't read.

"I'll send someone to read this later" she said to herself, still looking at the necklace.

"Hm... May as well. I deserve a reward for all this" she smiled.

As she entered her bedroom that night after her shower, dressed in only a nightgown, she saw the necklace, which she had placed on her bedside table.

Once again, she looked it over. Running her fingers up and down it.

"Well... Now that I have a mirror..." She pondered, putting the necklace on.

Once it latched, she had only a few seconds to appreciate it...

Her eyes rolled back in her head and she collapsed sideways onto her bed. Her body began to shake, making her giant tits and ample ass wobble.

"I must obey"

"My purpose is to serve"

"I will do as I am told"

She chanted these words over and over. For minutes.

Eventually her body settled, and her chanting stopped. Tsunade lay there, asleep, until morning.

Tsunade stepped out of her home the next day. She was going into work, but only briefly. The festival began in a few short hours. And so she made her way to her office. But little did she know what today had in store for her...

Unfortunately for Tsunade, she could not read that ancient text carved in the basin where she got the necklace. If she had, she never would have put it on. As the text read;

"Be wary, traveler. The dark magic cast on this golden accessory is highly dangerous. The weather will be unable to remove it of their own will, and from the moment they wear it, they will be unable to refuse any request or demand. If you see this, please turn back and never return."

Poor Tsunade had no idea... And her new life of servitude was just about to begin...

But what happens?
11111.title: A magical necklace

choices: Time passed, and her costume was ready (Reader's Choice on costume)
Naruto and/or Kiba entered to get their costume
111111.content:
Tsunade made her way into her office and took a seat at her desk, sighing deeply as she relaxed back. This last stretch of festival prep was going to be stressful. But it would be worth it once the festivities had begun.

As Tsunade sat there in a brief moment of peace, the door to her office opened and Shizune came in, papers in hand.

"Lady Tsunade" she said, bowing.

"Good morning, Shizune." she sighed "What do we need to do today?"

"Well, I have to get the entertainers organized. Get some of the patrols set up. Deal with the dignitaries from other villages who are coming to join in, and gather costumes for the show." she said

"Costumes?" Tsunade inquired

"Yeah. A local tailor was in charge of making them. Everyone has been fitted for them, and the man has been paid. The only people who haven't been fitted are..." she began, flipping through her papers "Naruto Uzumaki, Kiba Inzuka, and... well... you."

"I really have to dress in a costume?" Tsunade grumbled

"You get to pick out the design. I'd get going now if you want it to be done in time!" she said.

"Get going now" a voice rang in Tsunade's head. She stood up and began walking off.

"Yes. I'll get going now." she said as she approached the door.

"And remember! Get something fun! And if you're feeling extra special, maybe something more spicy!" Shizune giggled, clearly joking about the last part. But Tsunade's new necklace didn't pick up on that.

"Get something fun. Get something spicy" the voice droned in her head as she walked off.

Tsunade arrived at the tailor's shop and opened the door. Within, she saw a vast array of clothing spread out. Everything from t-shirts, to jumpers, to coats, to dresses. Costumes, robes, swimwear, everything she could ever imagine, honestly.

"Uh... hello?" she called out.

"Hm? Yes yes! Come in!" a voice replied.

Tsunade began walking through the store towards the back, seeing a man standing behind the counter.

"Oh! Lady Tsunade! What an honor! I assume you're here to get your costume?" he said

"I am."

"Well, if you'd let me take your measurements..." he began, taking out a measuring tape.

Usually Tsunade would take issue with this. But the necklace disagreed.

"Let him take my measurements" the voice droned again.

He began working, measuring her height, length, bust, waist, arms, legs, everything, before stepping away.

"Well! All I need now is to know what kind of costume you're looking for! Something traditional? Maybe something fun? Perhaps something scary?" he asked.

Tsunade started to speak. She wanted to ask for something traditional. Something fitting of her position. But those weren't her commands.

"Something fun. Something spicy" she said.

"Fun and... spicy? Lady Hokage do you mean..?" she man said, flabbergasted

"Something fun. Something spicy" she said again.

"Fun and spicy... I'll get right on it! It should only take me an hour or so. Feel free to wait right here!" he said, motioning towards a seat.

"Wait right here" the voice in her head stated, and Tsunade walked over and sat down.

As she sat there and waited...
111111.title: Shizune asks her to do something simple

1112.content: How is Sakura hypnotised, maybe Ino Yamanaka learns a forbidden technique which she uses to mess with Sakura, or maybe Sakura becomes an unwilling volunteer in a hypnosis show?
1112.title: Sakura

choices: Something simple to show off his control
Something crazy to really push the limits
11122.content:
It was Kiba Inzuka's first time displaying his hypnotic prowess.

The young man of the Inzuka family had been studying hypnosis for years. It had always fascinated him. However until today he had never had a real chance to show it off, his only prior practice being on his sister Hana, his mom Tsume, and trying it on his dog Akamaru. And none of it really worked all that well.

But today would be different.

Konoha was having a bit of a feastival, and Kiba was granted permission to set up a small stage for a hypnosis show. He was going to get SOMEONE.

As the festival kicked off, Kiba found himself alone.

Nobody had flocked to his stage. Nobody had shown up to participate. Nobody even around to watch. Just an empty stage in the back corner of the town.

Kiba sighed, looking for anything. AnyONE. Then eventually she came.

Sakura Haruno, the pink-haired cutie was strolling around town. Thankfully without her then boyfriend Sasuke.

Kiba had always had a bit of a secret crush on Sakura, but never really acted on it. But today would change that.

"Hey! Sakura!" He called out, getting her attention. She approached.

"Oh. Hey Kiba. What's up? This some kind of show?" She asked

"Yeah! It's my hypnosis show. But nobody came to watch"

"Well... If you were actually doing hypnosis maybe they would" she joked

"Yeah but I'd need a volunteer... Wait a second!" He said, an idea popping into his brain "Sakura! Help me out here!"

Sakura's eyes widened

"M-me?! Wait! I didnt-- I mean I can't... Kiba I'm not... Erm..." She stammered. Kiba had never seen her flustered before. It was honestly kind of cute.

"Come on! You said it yourself! I need to actually put on a show and I need a participant for that! Please?" He begged

Sakura felt bad. She didn't particularly WANT to be hypnotized but... This was sort of her idea.

"...oh fine!" She grumbled. Kiba pumped his fist in victory as she slowly made her way on to the stage.

Kiba pulled out a sparkily watch and dangled it before her

"Seriously? Isn't this a little cliche Kiba?" She asked

"Come on! Just watch it!"

Sakura relented.

Seconds passed. Then minutes. Kiba began to worry that maybe he wouldn't be able to do it. Maybe he would fail. But then he noticed it. Sakura's eye lids began to flutter, eventually slowly closing.

She stood before him, slack and relaxed. Breathing deeply and calmly.

She was hypnotized.

He danced around the stage happily... Only to realize a few people had gathered.

He had an audience!

But... He needed to entertain them somehow! What would he do?!
11122.title: Sakura the hypnotist’s dream girl

112131.content:
Marron found herself sitting in her room once again, thinking over what could have been.

If she and Krillin were still together, maybe things would be different.

She was living alone, in a single bedroom apartment. Her job, and her life, were seemingly going nowhere. And all because Krillin, the only man who had ever really been for her, ran off with someone else.

The woman Marron blamed for all of her problems. An angry, overly-serious blonde named "18".

Marron hated her from the bottom of her heart. Though she did have to admit, 18 WAS hot.

And Marron had come up with a bit of a plan. A way to get back at 18 for stealing Krillin away from her.

Hypnosis.

Marron had been spending the past few weeks learning about hypnosis. The best and most efficient methods. The way it worked.

And eventually she came to her decision as to how she would control 18.

One day while Krillin, 18, and their daughter; whose name still infuriated Marron, were away, the blue-haired beauty snuck into Krillin's home and lined the bedroom with small speakers. These speakers would broadcast subliminal hypnotic programming to 18 while she slept.

Now sure, she could use these on Krillin too, and force him to come back to her. But she wanted him to come back of his own choice. So she specified in the subliminals that only 18 is to obey them.

A few weeks passed, and every night 18's brain was unknowingly assaulted by Marrons hypnotic programming.

Thinking enough time had elapsed, and seeing Krillin head to work and his daughter go to school, she knocked on the front door.

18 answered, dressed in her normal black and purple long sleeved shirt and denim Jeans

"Can I help you with.. oh. You." She hissed

"Hi 18! Is Krillin home?" Marron giggled

"No. He isn't. And I wouldn't tell you if he was. I'd say it was nice seeing you, but it wasn't. Now goodbye" 18 huffed as she started closing the door

"Obedient Barbie!" Marron chirped.

As she did, the light left 18's eyes. They glassed over and her arms fell limply to her sides.

"Yes! It works!" Marron cheered, hopping up and down playfully.

"Aren't you going to invite me in?" She teased

"...please come in..." 18 droned drowsily as she stepped aside, allowing Marron to enter.

Marron flopped down onto the couch.

"Well? Come over here!"

18 closed the door and shuffled into the center of the room, waiting for further instructions.

Marron looked her over before deciding to...
112131.title: Sure

113.content: RWBY it is! Which girl would you want to see hypnotized?
113.title: RWBY

choices: Hypnotized by a clerk at a store
1132.content: Alright! And how does Yang get hypnotized?
1132.title: Yang Xiao-Long

11321.content:
Yang sighed as she flopped into her bunk in the team RWBY dorm. Things were stressful at Beacon. Training, classes, exams, and the occasional argument with Weiss. Usually Yang could just put it aside and not let it get to her. But tonight was not one such night.

She tossed and turned in bed. She couldn't sleep.

11PM became midnight. Midnight became 1. 1 became 2. And still, no sleep came to her.

Annoyed, tired, and desperate, Yang went to her Scroll and searched online for a solution. And soon after, she struck one. Hypnosis.

She didn't really believe in hypnosis. She thought it was all made up. Something people did on stage with actors. But at this point she was willing to try basically anything.

After another quick search, she came up with more than a few hypnosis videos. She looked some over. Most had some kind of alternative use to them. Hypnosis to quit smoking. Hypnosis for weight loss. Hypnosis for birthing.

"I just need a normal hypnosis video" she whispered to herself in annoyance.

Eventually she found one simply titled "Intro to Hypnosis: your first trance"

"Finally" she sighed "Sounds like this will just be sleeping"

Yang popped her earbuds in and began to listen. The soft spoken voice of a man came on.

"Hello there. Welcome to the intro to our hypnosis series. In this first video I'll be guiding you down into a nice, deep slumber"

"That's what I need" Yang said as she snuggled into her pillows, trying her best to get into a relaxed state to let the hypnosis take her.

"Now get nice and comfortable. Remove all distractions. No pets. No TV. Just you and your device. You and my voice. Listen to it soothe you. Listen to it take you deeper and deeper. Let your guard down. I know that may be hard, but for this to work, you need to accept my words. Trust me." he said.

Trust him? Yang didn't know this guy but at the same time... it was a video online. Not a person actually in front of her. She was willing to give a pre-recorded voice a chance.

The buxom blonde let her guard down, taking a deep breath.

"Now. Follow my voice deeper. Deeper. Deeper. Relax.... relax... relax... breathe in.... aaaand out... and in... aaand out..." the voice cooed.

Yang followed. In. Out. In. Out. Was this all it took? Breathing?

That was the last thought she had before she dropped. The trance taking her. Yang had gotten what she wanted. She was in a trance. Asleep. However... there was more to this video than she thought.

What she wanted was a quick and easy way to fall asleep... what she got was a playlist of hypnosis videos for the hypno fetishist with a bit of a humiliation kink.

The video continued on, slowly chipping away at her mind and programming her. Until eventually...

"From now on when you go to bed, you'll open up your phone and pull up one of my videos. You'll select at random. At the beginning of that video you'll hear 'Time to obey, little one' and when you do, you'll fall back into a trance for new programming. But for tonight, go ahead and open your eyes. But remain in a trance.

Yang's eyelids slowly lifted as she stared blankly upwards

"Now pick a random video from my playlist. Let it program you." he said.

Yang scrolled a moment before tapping the screen at random. A new video booted up.

"Time to obey, little one" it said, and her eyes closed again.

As morning broke, Yang stretched and hopped out of bed. She walked across the room, her bare feet dragging along the floor as she went to her dresser and grabbed her clothes for the day. She went into the bathroom to shower. But little did she know that in that bathroom her first programming would kick in.

Yang managed to get out of her clothes. However, her phone chimed as she sat her clothes in a pile. As it did, a trigger hit her, as Yang began to act according to her programming; all thanks to the video she clicked on last night, titled...

(Author's note: Whatever the video was titled will determine her actions and triggers through the day)

1142.title: Ochaco Uraraka

11422.content:
Mei Hatsume was sitting in the workshop, tinkering with a new baby, seeming annoyed.

"I can't believe that Shinso guy didn't want my new baby! I mean suuure it might be dangerous. But how am I going to progress science to make better babies without a little danger?!" She huffed, looking over to the corner of the room.

There sat a gun, looking a bit like a child's toy Lazer gun.

"I mean, all it would have done is made his powers stronger! And it can even control more than just minds, but bodies too... Uh... In theory" she muttered to herself.

Suddenly a revelation came upon her

"Wait! I bet he was hesitant because HE would have to try it! If it didn't go as planned then it was him on the line! Maybe if I tested it out, he would be willing to take my baby!" She giggled as she ran over and grabbed the gun

"Buuut I'll need a volunteer" she pondered.

No sooner had she said it, the door had opened. Ochako Uraraka standing in the doorway, nervously.

"Uhh... Hi Hatsume. Soni was wondering if maybe you could make--"

Before she could finish, Hatsume bolted over to her, wrapped an arm around her and pulled her into the room.

"You'll do perfectly!" She said with excitement and energy

"Waaah! Perfect for what?!" Ochako exclaimed.

"Don't worry don't worry! Just sit there and I will..." She snickered as she held the gun up.

"Wait! What is that?!"

Suddenly, a bolt of light fired from the gun, striking Ochako...

What was the effect?

11423.content: What if Ochako and all of the other girls in Both classes, where forced to run a new Hypno maze course by Mistress Midnight and it’s designer Mei Hatsume which has them running through multiple rooms that look like, mansions, costume stores, Stages, photo shoots etc. to see how prepared they are for enemies with hypnosis and mind control body powers? ( spoiler they’re not ready at all.)
11423.title: Something else

choices: The three adults who funded the trial
114231.content:
Uraraka made her way through the halls of U.A., moving briskly towards Midnight's class.

As she entered she noticed something... strange. Before her was only a fraction of the normal class.

Momo, Jiro, Tsu, Mina, and Toru were the only girls from her class that were present. However the 1-A students weren't the only ones there.

Itsuka Kendo, Yui Kodai, and Ibara Shiozaki of 1-B, and Nejire Hado, the third year and member of UA's Big Three were also here, sitting in their seats.

But they weren't the only things Uraraka found strange.

At the front of the class was Midnight, as usual. But also...

Mei Hatsume, the inventor from the support course, as well as three other women who Uraraka didn't recognize. Not immediately, anyway.

She took her seat, and class quickly began.

"Alright ladies!" Midnight boomed, swinging her whip "Today we have something special planned! But first let me introduce our guests!"

She pointed to the three women

"Mitsuki Bakugo, Fuyumi Todoroki, and Mika Jiro!"

"Hey mom" Jiro said, calmly.

"Why are they all here?" Mina asked, and Mitsuki stepped up.

"We agreed to come help out with this. In fact, we helped fund it... though uh.. some of us helped more than others" she said, looking to Fuyumi.

Fuyumi stepped forward

"Right... so miss Hatsume here worked with ourselves and Miss Midnight to create a bit of an obstacle course for you ladies."

Mika then stepped up

"As you know, there are a lot of powerful quirks out there. But what kind are the most dangerous?"

"Explosions!" Mina boomed, practically leaping from her seat. Mitsuki facepalmed

"Dammit Katsuki!" she groaned.

"After seeing her son, you might think that. But there are more dangerous ones" Mika responded.

"Mental quirks" Momo stated.

"Exactly! Especially for young ladies like yourselves. If it effects the mind it is dangerous for both civilians and heroes alike!" Midnight added in. "So we've created an obstacle course full of these kinds of effects. The intention is to have you run through it to test your resolve!"

"Uh... why aren't the boys doing this too?" Kendo asked

"Because statistically villains with these types of powers target women 999 out of 1000 times." Fuyumi sighed

"So we're doing this to try to lower our susceptibility?" Jiro asked

"That, or to help us learn the telltale signs so we can avoid it to begin with" Momo added.

"Exactly. Now, without further ad...oooo..." Mitsuki began, before a purple mist filled the room and all the women... well, except for Midnight and Mei, who had put on a gas mask, fell asleep.

"Don't worry girls! We'll get you there in a jiffy!" Mei boomed as a bulldozer-like robot came plowing into the room.


The women awoke later, looking up at a massive complex before them.

"Woah!" Nejire exclaimed as she looked up at the giant area, which honestly looked like a full city.

"Ha ha! Now that you're all awake, lets begin! Our first participants!" she boomed

12211.content:
Ben was in his room alone, he was busy studying. Not his homework or something like that but one of his cousin's magical spell books. His grandmother Verdona, said he didn't have the spark. At first he really didn't mind after all, he did have the Omnitrix. Yet, over the years he kind used he could used his anodite powers.

Gwen thought it was funny he wanted to study magic. She knew he didn't have the spark but humor him anyway. So she lend him a few of her beginners magical spells books. He spend the last couple of months studying and meditating, trying to unlock his anodite powers.

Yet, he failed every time. He was getting a little frustrated. Luckily his legendary stubbornness wouldn't let him give up. He sighed, as opened one of the books. He was trying to find a very simple spell. After a few minutes, he found a hypnosis spell. This spell would put anyone to unbreakable hypnotic trance. Then he can give them commands that they will follow.

Being a eighteen year old boy, he thought about a few naughty ways he could used this. He grinned, imagining him and a harem of women serving him sexually. He went back to the book, he closed his eyes as ready himself to try the spell.

He stood up and faced the door. He started chanting the spell and moving his hands in a circlet motion. Unbeknownst to him, green magical energy started swirling around. Then without warning the door to his room opened.

His mother Sandra walked in, she was a blonde MILF. Even Ben had a few fantasies about her. She had long blonde hair and green eyes. She had a figure that rivalled most lingerie models, long legs and massive F cup tits. She was wearing a simple green blouse, white pants and white flats.

As she stepped in, she noticed the swirling green magical energy. She wanted to look away, but so found herself entranced by the light. Soon her eyes went blanked, as she went into a trance.

Ben opened his eyes and to his surprised and joy he saw the swirling energy. He grinned, as he finally got it. He lost his concentration and the energy vanished, he groaned. Then he sighed, he just had it.

Then he noticed his mother, he gulped. He feared she would yell at him. He waited for her to say something, but she just stood there. He was puzzled, as he slowly approached her. He looked at her face and saw her eyes where blanked. He waved a hand in her face but she didn't reacted at all.

Then he realized she was in a trance. He remembered what the book said and grinned. He should just snapped her out of it, but his raging hormones said something else. He gulped, as he thought about a few naughty commands he wanted to try out.

So what where those commands ?
12211.title: Ben the Hypno mage

" When I snap my fingers you will wake up and remember none of this." Said Ben, then he snapped his fingers.

Sandra shook her head, as she snappes out of the trance. Then she started stripping, she took of her green blouse and white pants. Now clad in only a strapless green lace bra and matching thong.

" Sandra, be a good mom and ....

1222.content: How does Gwen Tennyson get hypnotized
1222.title: Gwen Tennyson

choices: Ben does something else with her
12221.content:
Gwen seemed agitated as she heard her cousin once again play his video games, even as teens he didn't kick all of his bad habits, at least he isn't as much of a pain like he was when they were kids, but Ben still has his faults. Gwen decided to put a stop to this noise as she got up from her desk and went towards the offender, who's happily wasting his life with that nonsense.

"Hey, knock it off!" Gwen hissed at Ben, Ben rolled his eyes and kept playing, causing the redhead to abruptly turn his game off.

"Hey!" Ben protested.

"Hey yourself, have some common decency for people trying to study for exams, you know the ones YOU need to study for?!" Gwen argued.

"Eh I'll be fine." Ben shrugs off, "besides we have a week, plenty of time."

"A week turns into a day." Gwen grumbled.

"Who are you my mom?!" Ben groaned.

"Ugh, fine you want to flunk out of class by all means, but stop putting the music so loud!" Gwen practically hissed.

"There's no point if there's no music, and you ruined the mood." Ben grumbled as he got up to stretch.

"Sure blame me for your laziness." Gwen rolled her eyes, as she saw Ben walk off, "HEY!"

"What didn't you say you wanted to study?" Ben asked as he went to the kitchen to get a snack.

1251.title: Danny Phantom

12511.content: Who will hypnotise Maddie Fenton? How about the catty therapist Penelope Spectra, who decides to humiliate the ghost hunter with some hypnotic suggestions?
12511.title: Maddie

125111.content:
Spectra was, to be blunt, annoyed.

Not only had Danny Fenton defeated her multiple times, but his mother, sister, and friend Sam also took her down.

She knew she didn't stand a chance against Danny. She also knew that Jazz and Sam would recognize her in her human disguise, so that was out.

She was running out of options for people to get revenge on. But there was one option. Maddie.

Maddie had been instrumental in defeating her, Ember, and Kitty during their bout to remove all the men from Amity Park. In fact, Maddie lead the charge. But Maddie had never really seen her human form. At least, she had never realized that Penelope Spectra, school therapist and counselor, was the same as Spectra the ghost.

Spectra was feeling particularly vengeful. She couldn't do anything too crazy. Her grander plans tended to attract the attention of Danny, or his little fan club, and those were issues she didn't want to deal with. But she had a more... minor idea in mind. Something to sate her lust for revenge, have some fun, and keep Danny off her back.

She arrived at the Fenton household at ten AM, early enough that Danny and Jazz were definitely not home, took her human disguise, and knocked.

After a brief moment, a burly voice rang out.

"Comiiing!"

The door swung open, and Jack Fenton stood in the door frame, practically taking the whole thing up.

"Hello! Can I help you?!" he boomed.

"Yes, hello. My name is Penelope Spectra. I'm from Casper High. I work there as a therapist for the students."

"....Okay." Jack said, clearly not understanding what was happening.

Spectra sighed.

"Sir, is your wife home?"

"She sure is! Maddie! Someone's here for you!" he said, as he grabbed a strange looking device "I'm going to test out the Ghost Phantasmagorifier while you talk!" he boomed, taking the odd backpack like device and running past Spectra, out to the street.

"Idiot" she hissed under her breath.

"Hello there. Can I help you?" Maddie said with a smile as she approached the door.

"Hello. My name is Penelope Spectra. I work at Casper high. I'm here to talk to you about your son, Daniel" she said.

"Danny? Is he in trouble?!" she gasped

"It may be best if we talk inside"

Maddie nodded and the two stepped into the kitchen, sitting at the table.

"So what's going on with Danny?" Maddie said, fidgeting in her seat, nervously.

"Well, Daniel has recently come to me to talk about some problems he's having. Stress, mostly. Now, this isn't a major issue. However the options I've tried with him haven't been working. So I'd like to try something a bit more... unorthodox. But only with parental permission" she said.

"Unorthodox? What do you want to do with my son?" Maddie asked, defensively

"Hypnosis"

Maddie looked at her in confusion

"Hypnosis?"

"That's right. Like I said, it's a bit strange. Daniel has agreed to it, but we need permission from you before anything can be done."

Maddie thought a moment

"I don't like it" she said

"I understand. Many people are a little off-put by the idea. But I think I know how to get you on board" Spectra cooed

"Really? I'm not sure..."

"Ma'am. This may be a strange request but... let me hypnotize you" Spectra added

"Wha?! Me?!" Maddie exclaimed

"If I hypnotize you, it will show you that there's nothing to worry about. Like I said I know it's a strange request, but I truly believe this will help your son. And if I show you by hypnotizing you, I think you'll understand."

Maddie looked down, arms crossed, thinking long and hard. She looked up at Spectra with determination.

"If you really think it can help Danny... fine. You can try to show me..." she boldly claimed.

Spectra smiled, pulling out a shiny gem on a chain. Something she had taken from the Ghost Zone, actually, which would make this easier. The only caveat to it's hypnotic powers was a willing participant, which she now had.

She held the gem up and almost instantly Maddie found herself staring blankly ahead.

"Excellent!" Spectra snickered "Now to have some fun"

What does Spectra do with the entranced woman?
125111.title: Sure

choices: Put on a slutty maid costume and pose for a humiliating sexy photoshoot
1251111.content:
Spectra took a second to think of what to force Danny’s mother to do first, clicking her fingers as she tried to come up of an idea. And with one single

*Click*

An idea popped in Spectra’s head that made a malicious grin appear on her face. ‘Of course I’ll plant some ingenious post hypnotic suggestions into her gullible mind to force her to do whatever humiliating thing I can think off.’ Thought spectra as she began to chuckle in Maddie’s face, who was blankly staring into space.

“Now Maddie listen to me very closely from now on you shall only call me Mistress Spectra. Understand?” Commanded the spirit from the beyond feeling the excitement rush through her ethereal form, thinking of how much power she would gain from humiliating this gullible women, why if she humiliated her enough she might even be able to defeat Danny easily.

Meanwhile Maddie couldn’t even consider saying no to the demeaning request as she replied with “Yes Mistress Spectra.” Like a machine which made Spectra’s grin grow even bigger.

“Good girl, now whenever I click my fingers like this.”

*click*

“You will strike a sexy pose like a model. Whenever I whistle, you will follow me obediently, like a submissive little puppy, and finally whenever I utter the phrase. “I insist.” You will follow whatever command that follows it understand my Gullible Slut.” Mocked Spectra excited at the power that was soon to return to her once humiliating the foolish mother.

“Yes mistress Spectra.” Robotically replied Maddie not realising the hell she was about to go through.

Spectra then took a deep breath, as she began to get back into character as a caring therapist.

“Now when I say “wakes wakey” you will awaken from your trance like state and only subconsciously remember these commands, understand my precious little fool.” Said Spectra as Maddie replied fully with “Yes mistress Spectra.”

Spectra then smiled gently like a wolf in sheep’s clothing as she said. “Wakey wakey.”

Maddie then jolted awake in shock, confused by what had just happened. “Ugh I’m sorry, I think I dosed off while you were talking. So did the hypnosis work Mistress Spectra?” Asked Maddie as she blushed realising what she said while Spectra snickered in delight as she felt herself growing more powerful.

“Well yes it did Maddie as you can tell, I hope you don’t mind making you call me that just a little joke I thought would be funny.” Slyly said Spectra as Maddie found herself getting annoyed at the therapist and her embarrassing ‘Joke’.

Maddie sighed as she tried to stay calm. “It’s fine, don’t worry about it, anyway I’m sorry Mistress Spectra -.” Maddie tried to explain only to be embarrassed and annoyed as she called the therapist mistress again.

“But I don’t want my son doing this, now I want you to get out and never come back!” demanded an annoyed Maddie as she stood up ready to force this bizarre women out of her house if she needed too.


However Spectra just snickered as she stood confidently in front of her victim. “Oh I don’t think that gonna happen Maddie.” Threatened Spectra as she snapped her fingers

*Click*

With Maddie gasping as she suddenly found herself posing like a slutty model, as she stuck out her rear end and squeezed her boobs in her hands, with Maddie unwillingly moaning in pleasure as she did it, humiliating her further as Spectra began to feel invincible.

“W-what the!...Hey y-you made me do this don’t you, you bitch what kinda sick twisted therapist are you Mistress Spectra!” Angrily demanded Maddie as she blushed a deep red, that almost matched Spectra’s suit.

Spectra then chuckled maniacally as she decided to explain her evil plan to her victim. “Well Maddie maybe you don’t remember me to well, but don’t worry allow me to explain, a few months ago you, your daughter and some goth chick defeated and humiliated me, and now I want to pay you back with more humiliation , and since you clearly love to show of your busty body, I think you can follow me to my office so I can show your embarrasses off to the world.”

Maddie growled in anger as she remembered the ghost. “Grrrr I remember you now, you made me look like a fool, well sorry but there’s no chance in hell I’d let you humiliate me in your sick little dungeon!” Explained Maddie defiantly as Maddie calmly laughed at her.

“Oh Maddie, you gullible fool, you don’t have a say in the matter.”

Spectra then whistled as Maddie suddenly found herself being able to move again, only to lose control of her body as she began to walk out of her house with her head down like a submissive school girl who was being sent to the principals office.

“Grrr I’ll get you for this!” Maddie said as she tried to fight her body, while Spectra simply laughed in her face confidently strutting behind Maddie as she lead her to her Lair.

When Spectra has lead Maddie to her office. Madrid was mortified to see the office had hundreds of slutty outfits on clothing racks, a vanity table, multiple sex toys lying about and worst of all, a camera to take pictures. Maddie grimaced at what Spectra was planning to do to her as Spectra commanded her too....

135.title: Something Else

info.brief_description: Girls from various forms of fiction get mind controlled!
info.description:
I posted this over on Chyoa, but it's been getting almost no interaction other than people favoriting. My hope is that reposting what I have there, over here, will get some more people making additions!

RULES

- Please try to keep storylines focused on the general concept. If you have a story about Tsunade from Naruto getting hypnotized, please keep things focused on her. I'm fine with you adding other characters, but make it make sense, and keep Tsunade as the focus
- No vore, gore, scat, urination, BDSM, feet, or Malesub
- Please try to keep chapters long. At least 300 words, but I'd prefer more. If I feel like you're just phoning it in I will delete chapters. Obvious exception for choice chapters (ex: What character gets hypnotized?) type stuff
- I may add more rules later. But otherwise, go nuts!
